structure.unit: Sec. 11-2105. - RIGHT TURNS ON RED TRAFFIC CONTROL SIGNAL LIGHTS PROHIBITED.

law.catch_line: RIGHT TURNS ON RED TRAFFIC CONTROL SIGNAL LIGHTS PROHIBITED.
law.text: After authorized signs have been erected giving notice thereof, it shall be unlawful to proceed to turn right while facing a red traffic light at those locations specified in official Traffic Schedule No. 1, Electronic traffic control signals. Cross reference: Schedules incorporated by reference, ยง11-2004
